runs.comm: straight delivery to start, quicker ball. On a good length, Shehzad pats it back
he comes down the track immediately and smashes the fuller length over mid-off. Great shot. picked his gap and executed perfectly.
slightly slower and wider, Shehzad tries to run the ball past short third man but can only hit it to him.
fuller again outside off, no spin. Driven to cover
and a repeat. pushed through quicker outside off on a fuller length which is driven to cover.
fuller on middle this time, Shehzad runs down and chips the ball down to long-on where there is a misfield, allowing them the extra run
good start, tight line outside off on a good length. Mukhtar guides the ball down to third man with the open face of the bat
drifts this one on leg stump and Shehzad nicely clips the ball down to deep square leg.
fuller again outside off, just a hint of width. Mukhtar opens the face again to steer it wide of backward point, well enough for them to get two
and again.. Fuller length outside off, Mukhtar dbas the ball to third man for just one this time
crashed through the cover region for four. Not a great ball and dispatched to the boundary. Short and wide outside off, Shehzad carves his back and creams the drive through cover
fullish delivery on middle this time, Shehzad drives the ball towards midwicket and sets off for an easy run
very full and very wide outside off. Shehzad lets it go, anticipating a wide. But not called. Just inside the wide line
short and wide outside off this time, Shehzad times it really well but fails to place the ball in the gap. the drive goes straight to cover
another terrific shot from Shehzad. Timed beautifully. Shehzad lets the ball come into him before deflecting it elegantly through the vacant midwicket region for four more.
fullish length again outside off, Shehzad drives but straight to mid-off

good work from the wicketkeeper there. Fullish length again and wide, Shehzad throws his hands at it but the ball drifts back in and takes the inside edge, that was looking like four until Mutumbami saved it
fuller again on middle, Shehzad skips down the track and bunts the ball to mid-on for another quick single off the last ball of the over.
better lengths and lines from Chibhabha. Full on a fourth-stump line. Shehzad turns the ball towards midwicket
this time short and wide, but the ball comes onto Shehzad a bit too slowly, who chops the ball back onto the ground
Shehzad tries to put Chibhabha's length off by advancing but the lines are still good outside off. Skewed off back to the bowler

this time he gets the wicket. The tight lines have worked and Shehzad has to go. He gives himself room to try to find a gap through the off side but Chibhabha fires a quick ball on off stump and very full. He misses the exuberant drive and Zimbabwe strike. Shehzad tried to go over the infield with the inside-out shot but didnt work.
suberb shot immediately. Maqsood waits for the ball to come to him before delightfully driving through cover. A bit too full from Chibhabha. But Chigumbura chases it down excellently. Saves one
short ball this time down the leg side too. Mukhtar thinks of pulling but is late on it. Called wide

another wicket. Mukhtar goes this time. Quite a poor shot that with the long-on fielder in place. Full on middle and leg, and Mukhtar tries to hit the ball down the ground but the ball stops on him a touch and takes the inside half of the bat. He can only skew the ball straight into long-on's hands. Masakadza takes a relatively simple catch and Zimbabwe are right in it now.
poor ball to start from Jongwe. Straying down leg and Maqsood doesn't have to do much, clips nicely off his pads towards deep square leg. They get two this time
drifts down leg again. This time too wide and called
better stuff. Good length outside off, Maqsood stays on the back foot and punches the drive to cover
overpitched but on off stump. Maqsood punchily-drives it again but to cover off the front foot
slower delivery this time and good lines too. Full on off, Maqsood watchfully blocks off the front foot
good comeback this from Jongwe. Excellent lines juts outside off, Maqsood drives to cover off the back foot
very full again on middle and leg, not a bad delivery considering long-on and deep square leg. Maqsood powers the drive to long-on for a single. Not a bad over at all.
comes back in with the angle from wide of the crease. Maqsood inside edges the ball onto his body
very full outside off, Maqsood fails to find the gap and hits to cover

the pressure tells. An exceptionally poor shot. Just a straight ball, no movement. Maqsood looks to swipe the ball across the line into the leg side but misses completely. Rattles the off and middle stump and Pakistan suddenly require a consolidation period
oh fantastic start. This was a poor ball to the new man. Full on leg stump, and Akmal finds the gap through midwicket and mid-on for four. Just what he needed to start
better from Chamu. Good length on a fifth-stump line, Akmal gets behind the ball and blocks
full on off and middle, Akmal drives nicely but finds the fielder at mid-on
darted in on middle and leg, Malik turns the ball through midwicket for a single
very quick outside off, Akmal waits and plays a very late cut past short third man. Masakazda does well to pull it back inside the boundary however.
driven down the ground but straight to midwicket
thick edge this time gets Malik a boundary. Short and wide, Malik throws his hand at it to get a thick outside edge which flies to the third man fence
quick on middle, Malik opens the face of the bat to guide the ball into the off side with soft hands
darted in on middle and Akmal blocks off the front foot
lands it on leg to start, not much spin. Malik turns it into the deep square leg region with soft hands, and they are able to get back for two
fuller on off, guided to third man
short and pulled away towards long-on but only one
a bit of width outside off, Akmal continues to play the late cut but again straight to short third man
pushed into the leg side again and Akmal immediately calls for two. But the fielder is quick on it and prevents the second run
full on middle and leg, Malik drills the drive against the spin to long-on
darted in outside off, Malik drives towards cover where there is a half-stop, allowing them the one
quick on leg, Akmal nudges the ball off his pads to deep square leg
fullish on leg, Malik whips the ball to deep midwicket
too straight again, Akmal has no trouble in clipping the ball off his pads to square leg

too wide outside off this time, Malik creams a drive nicely into the gap just wide of cover. The fielder at the sweeper pushes the ball wide of the long-off fielder and the lack of communication gives Malik a few extra runs as they run four.
driven from the wide line to the sweeper cover
what a shot. That was massive. Flighted on off, Malik anticipates the flight and runs down the track, meets the ball as it pitches and smashes the ball over long-off
and the follow-up is flat. Malik knows what is coming, stays back and flat-bats the pull to deep midwicket
flat again on off, Akmal swivel-pulls uppishly but in the gap between long-on and deep midwicket
tries to be too cheeky again. Pushed through quicker in the air outside off, Akmal tries a cut late cut but misses altogether
better shot, much fuller on middle and Akmal drives the ball down to the ground to long-on
the ball did not come on there, very slowly delivered from Cremer outside off. Malik goes on the back foot immediately and waits for the ball, then waits some more before awkwardly driving to long-on
nice start, good length on middle, Malik is nicely set now and easily carves the ball into the leg side
and the ill-executed late cut again from Akmal. Too slow to get the gap outside off, Akmal makes contact but the ball goes straight to short third man
fuller, slow and straight, Akmal has plenty of time to get back and drive to long-on
slightly short from Williams but on off, Malik gives himself room and plays a nice cut to the sweeper cover
Akmal tries the fine sweep that time, a muted appeal as the ball hits him on the pads. Looked like it may have gone down leg though. They run a leg bye
short and wide, Malik makes contactmway too early and therefore the ball goes straight to cover
too short from Cremer and UA can't find the gap, he cuts nicely but straight to point

and a few dot balls result in yet another wicket. Not a bad shot to attempt however. Flighted on off, and Akmal dances down the track but can only squirt the ball off the inside half straight to Masakadza at long-on. Very similar to the Mukhtar dismissal. Akmal got too close to the ball on that occasion, not allowing himself the room to get under the ball
googly outside off, Rizwan doesn't pick it and awkward;y finds cover with a drive
a bit too wide this time but getting some spin is Cremer. Rizwan pushes it wide of point, and scampers through for two
better from Cremer, full and straight, Rizwan opens the face of the bat and hits it towards cover. Thinks of one but is sent back
fuller again, good finish to the over. Rizwan watchfully plays the ball with the spin into the off side
fullish on off, Malik plays the ball late into the off side for one.
a fine sweep again attempted but not executed. A muted appeal but too much doubt to be given. Got well outside the line of off stump too

oh, ripper. An absolute beauty. Missed stumping too. Flighted delivery on off, the ball pitches and rips past Rizwan's outside edge as he comes down the track to work into the leg side. Mutumbami, too,m is beaten by the amount of turn.
powerfully swept into the leg side towards deep square leg
nicely played from Malik, waits for the ball to spin before working the ball down the ground to long-on
more spin but Rizwan plays this nicely. The ball spins a mile again, Rizwan opens the face of his bat and guides it down to short third man. Played very late
bowled quicker on middle, whipped into the leg side
nicely bowled again, fuller on off, Rizwan however plays it nicely too. Opens the face of the bat and guides the ball to the sweeper cover
almost holed out this time, Malik advances down the track but skews the ball in the air towards long-on but falls short
tries the late cut again but no connection
googly this time and Rizwan doesn't pick it again, somehow keeps it out

this one drifts on with the arm, what happened there? Rizwan awkwardly keeps the ball out again but ends up kicking the ball towards the stumps, Mutumbami gets in the way and prevents that from happening. may not have hit the stumps anyway.
what a shot, slightly short and Malik gets back quickly and smashes a pull through midwicket, finds the gap for four

skidded on with the arm and took out leg stump, Malik goes after a fine innings. Just did not expect that to move on with the angle. He made room and tried to cut the ball through the leg side but sneaked through his defense and clattered into the stumps. Massive wicket
fuller delivery on off, not much spin there, Wasim drives with the spin down to long-on for the single
a very fine sweep this time, very slow turn and Rizwan gets down early and executes nicely this time, the pair are able to get through for two
slider again on off, Rizwan opens the face and hits the ball into the of side towards sweeper cover
big turn there again, from outside off. Wasim is beaten by the excessive turn and the ball hits him on the body
pushed through quick on off, driven back to the bowler
swiped into the leg side, not a good looking shot. But the ball is in the gap towards midwicket and they can get another two
fired in quick outside off, Rizwan comes down and cuts into the gap wide of point for another brace
ooih, nice work from Raza. Very full on middle, Rizwan hits to midwicket who is lurking, Raza picks up and fires in a throw at the non-strikers end but not accurate
pushed into the leg side with soft hands, they come back for a suicidal second run. But the throw isn't good enough at the non-strikers end.  A direct hit would have had him
dropped this time. Short on middle, Rizwan hoicks the ball in the air to deep midwicket. Chibhabha runs a good few feet but can't hold onto a hard chance
wide called, nothing delivery. But lots of spin. Short and wide and an extra run
a very similar ball but closer to the wide line. Short and wide outside off, Wasim crashes a cut through the sweeper cover
very full on leg, Rizwan makes room but hits the ball to cover
great connection from rizwan, what a shot. Full on middle and Rizwan slog-sweeps the ball over midwicket. Went  a long way.
nicely played, waited for the ball to come to him and then deflects the ball wide of point for another brace
smashes the fuller length down the ground towards long-off for one
fired in outside off, Wasim creams the drive to cover where there is a misfield allowing them the single
oh another really nice shot. The reverse sweep comes out of the arsenal. Plays the ball very fine past short third man
very full and quick, Rizwan advances and crashes the ball down to long-on
not properly timed again. Full from outside off, turning in, Wasim can't time the heave, hits down to long-on
another expansive aerial shot but goes straight to long-on for just the single
excellent connection this time. Gets to the pitch of the ball and lofts the ball easily over the long-on boundary. Vital boundary
follows the six with another terrific shot. Gets to the pitch again with a dance down the track and always wanted to hit down the ground, powers the drive past long-on for another boundary

tries the lap sweep this time does Rizwan but has not executed too well with these shots. Well bowled though, very full and wide, Rizwan can't get under it and ends up missing it, the ball hits the shoe and lobs up to the keeper. They scamper one
immediate apology. Slipped out of Jongwe's hands and ends up delivering a beamer. Wasim gets down early and evades the ball
well bowled from Jongwe. Spared in the blockhole, powered down the ground for one
slower ball on leg, Rizwan gets down early to try and swipe the ball through the leg side but is too early on the shot. The ball kisses his glove and rolls into the off side
slower offcutter outside off, clobbered down the ground for one
slower delivery again, heaved into the leg side off the front foot on the bounce to the deep square leg fielder

gets the wicket this time, slower delivery yet again outside off, Wasim looks to carve the ball over the infield in the off side but can only chip the ball into short third man's hands off the outer half of the bat
Rizwan attemps the lap sweep again but can't connect properly. Hits the glove and rolls to the keeper, Afridi refuses the single
slower delivery on leg, rizwan gives himself room but the ball follows Rizwan whose heave goes out to deep square leg for one.
wild slog from Afridi first up but what else can he do at this point? Short on middle, Afridi looks to heave but misses completely
makes contact with his wipe this time, the swat goes towards deep square leg who does well to keep the ball inside the field of play

gone this time, an excellent effort from Chibabha. An unbelievable effort. Short on middle and leg, Afridi flat-bats the pull uppishly towards deep midwicket. Afridi waits to see what the umpires have to say. Chibahbha dives full-length and takes a really good low catch. but was it grassed? No, says the umpire. and Afridi has to go. Excellent catch.

slower offcutter again and Rizwan is beaten by the pace, he is through the shot way too early and misses. Riaz decides to go for the extra run and sacrifices his wicket for the cause as Mutumbami picks up and throws the stumps down at the strikers end with an accurate throw.
